project_abstract.cdata: The project consists of: pavement strengthening of about 200 km of roads; realignment of a 27 km section of the Azaguie-Adzope road and construction of the Anyama-Agboville road (about 45km); purchase of traffic counting, weight control and pavement survey equipment; technical assistance to establish a Planning and Research Unit, to improve training, and to reorganize the Public Works Laboratory; and pre-investment studies.
